org.apache.cocoon.environment.http
Class HttpResponse

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cocoon.environment.impl.AbstractResponse
      org.apache.cocoon.environment.http.HttpResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServletResponse, org.apache.cocoon.environment.Response, ServletResponse
public final class HttpResponse
extends AbstractResponse
implements org.apache.cocoon.environment.Response

Implements the Response interface to provide response functionality in the HTTP servlets environment.

Version:
$Id: HttpResponse.java 587751 2007-10-24 02:41:36Z vgritsenko $
